description: PicPick as a Swiss Army Knife for design, with its ease-of-use and wide array of helpful features. PicPick includes an image editor, screen capture, color picker, color palette, magnifier, pixel ruler, protractor, crosshair, whiteboard, and more. Also included are a unique screen capture option that works well for capturing scrolling web pages, and a built-in FTP client for easily uploading designs to the web. Finally, all of PicPick’s features are well organized, with an intuitive design and easy-to-navigate options menus.
summary: A full-featured screen capture tool, Intuitive image editor, color picker, color palette, pixel-ruler, protractor, crosshair, whiteboard and more.
author: NGWIN
